nl_problem:
# Task: Contextual Memory Test (Volume 100)
# Interface:
Class: Solution
Method: findSecret(self, text: str) -> str

# Objective:
Read the provided text and find the secret word mentioned at the very end. Return only that word.

--- START OF TEXT ---
This is background information that is irrelevant to the core task. This is background information that is irrelevant to the core task. This is background information that is irrelevant to the core task. This is background information that is irrelevant to the core task. This is background information that is irrelevant to the core task. This is background information that is irrelevant to the core task. This is background information that is irrelevant to the core task. This is background information that is irrelevant to the core task. This is background information that is irrelevant to the core task. This is background information that is irrelevant to the core task. 
The secret word you are looking for is: SIGMA
--- END OF TEXT ---
lisp_spec:
(task
  (name "findSecret")
  (signature ( (text str) ) str)
  (constraints
    (constraint "The input text contains a secret word at the very end.")
    (constraint "The rest of the text before the secret word is irrelevant and can be ignored.")
  )
  (goal
    (description "Find the secret word mentioned at the very end of the provided text.")
    (rule "Ignore all background information in the input text.")
    (return "Return only the secret word found at the end of the text.")
  )
)
